physical_appearance:This is a gold headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The scalloped-shape base is designed to fit the head. The front of the headdress features floral-like star-burst motifs amidst wire scrolls and arabesques. The border
 as well as the floral design
 is embedded with diamonds. The gold gilding is slightly faded.

metadata.title_text: Gilded Wedding Crown set with Diamantes
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a gold headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The scalloped-shape base is designed to fit the head. The front of the headdress features floral-like star-burst motifs amidst wire scrolls and arabesques. The border, as well as the floral design, is embedded with diamonds. The gold gilding is slightly faded.
